plan_description: Everything you need to launch an online store.

feature_categories.title: General features
feature_categories.description: Everything you need to grow your business.

features.title: Online store
features.description: All-in-one solution for starting your ecommerce store.

features.title: Mobile app
features.description: Manage your store on the go with the Woo Mobile App.

features.title: 24/7 support
features.description: Need help? Reach out to us anytime, anywhere. Get 24/7 support via live chat and email.

features.title: Unlimited staff accounts
features.description: Let your colleagues work on the site with you.

features.title: Credit card rate: 2.9% + 30Â¢
features.description: Accept Visa, Mastercard and all other major payment methods.

features.title: Sell in over 100 currencies
features.description: Meet your buyers where they are: accepts payments in 135+ currencies, no other extensions needed.

features.title: Advanced subscriptions
features.description: Let customers subscribe to your products or services and pay on a weekly, monthly or annual basis.

features.title: Pre-orders
features.description: Allow customers to order products before they are available.

features.title: Stripe M2 Reader
features.description: Easy-to-use mobile card reader designed for fast, reliable in-person payments, including contactless, swipe, and chip. (Additional purchase required.)

features.title: Tap to Pay on iPhone
features.description: Take contactless payments on an iPhone XS or newer, no additional hardware needed.

feature_categories.title: Product management
feature_categories.description: Simplify the way you manage, sell and promote your products.

features.title: Unlimited products
features.description: Add unlimited products to your store.

features.title: Offer gift cards
features.description: Sell and accept pre-paid, multi-purpose e-gift vouchers.

features.title: Send back in stock notifications
features.description: Notify customers when your products are restocked.

features.title: Set order limits
features.description: Specify min and max allowed product quantities for orders.

features.title: Offer customizable product kits
features.description: Use Composite Products to add product kit building functionality with inventory management.

features.title: Import your products via CSV
features.description: Import, merge, and export products using a CSV file.

features.title: Sell product add-ons
features.description: Enable gift wrapping messages or custom pricing.

features.title: Unlimited images
features.description: Add any number of images to your products.

features.title: Product recommendations
features.description: Earn more revenue with automated upsell and cross-sell product recommendations.

feature_categories.title: Themes and customization
feature_categories.description: Simplify the way you manage, sell and promote your products.

features.title: Premium themes
features.description: Tap into a diverse selection of beautifully designed premium themes.

features.title: Block-based templates
features.description: Take control over your store's layout without touching a line of code.

features.title: Cart and checkout optimization
features.description: Streamline your checkout and boost conversions with the Cart and Checkout blocks.

feature_categories.title: Marketing and conversion
feature_categories.description: Grow your sales with built-in marketing and conversion tools.

features.title: Sync with social channels
features.description: Promote your products across popular social media platforms, including Facebook, Pinterest, and TikTok.

features.title: Advertise with Google
features.description: Create and manage ads promoting your products to Google users, straight from your dashboard.

features.title: Recover abandoned carts
features.description: Drive more sales by automatically emailing customers who leave your store without checking out.

features.title: Encourage referrals
features.description: Offer free gifts or coupons when your customers refer new shoppers.

features.title: Send birthday coupons
features.description: Automatically email our customers a birthday discount to keep them coming back.

features.title: Drive loyalty
features.description: Keep your loyal customers loyal with a rewards program

feature_categories.title: Shipping
feature_categories.description: Grow your sales with built-in marketing and conversion tools.

features.title: Shipping labels
features.description: Save on shipping by printing labels right from your store.

features.title: Shipping tracking
features.description: Provide customers with an easy way to track their shipment.

features.title: Shipping rates
features.description: Define multiple shipping rates based on location, price, weight, or other criteria.

features.title: Conditional shipping and payments
features.description: Use conditional logic to restrict the shipping and payment options.

features.title: Returns and warranty
features.description: Manage the RMA process, add warranties to products and let customers request/manage returns from their account.
